name: ext_R4_Consent_pr_actor
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Consent.provision.actor for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents Consent.provision.actor from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Consent|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.

element.short: Who|what controlled by this rule (or group, by role)
element.definition: Who or what is controlled by this rule. Use group to identify a set of actors by some property they share (e.g. 'admitting officers').
element.comment: `Consent.provision.actor` maps to R3 `Consent.actor`. To multiple elements in Consent: (`Consent.actor`, `Consent.except.actor`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Consent.provision.actor` maps to R3 `Consent.except.actor`. To multiple elements in Consent: (`Consent.actor`, `Consent.except.actor`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: How the individual is involved in the resources content that is described in the exception.

binding.description: How an actor is involved in the consent considerations.

element.short: Resource for the actor (or group, by role)
element.definition: The resource that identifies the actor. To identify actors by type, use group to identify a set of actors by some property they share (e.g. 'admitting officers').
